snippet: Nathaniel Borenstein is chief scientist of a cloud-based e-mail management company. Of his constant flying he says, “Almost everything that can go wrong, without killing me, has gone wrong.”
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Nathaniel Borenstein, chief scientist of Mimecast, discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Nathaniel Borenstein is chief scientist of a cloud-based e-mail management company. Of his constant flying he says, “Almost everything that can go wrong, without killing me, has gone wrong.”

headline.seo: A Flying History Ruled by Murphy’s Law
headline.main: No Luck, but Grace Under Turbulence
headline.print_headline: No Luck, but Grace Under Turbulence
